---
id: register
title: "New user registration"
description: "The API allows users to create a new account by providing their details. It accepts user information such as name, email, and password, and registers the user in the system."

hide_title: true

sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

custom_edit_url: null

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"New user registration"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/register"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allows users to create a new account by providing their details. It accepts user information such as name, email, and password, and registers the user in the system.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **To get phone code for respective country:**
          Execute the API endpoint (Rules and MDM):  
          /country/phone-code. 
          
          **e.g.** ("country_name": "Angola",                 "phone_code": "244" )
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"phone_code"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int64"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":244,"description":"The country dialing code for the user's phone number.\n\n e.g: **244** is the dialing code for Angola."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"first_name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"Nelson","description":"The user’s first name."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"last_name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"Milton","description":"The user’s last name."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"contact_number"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"1771953049","description":"The user's phone number, formatted without any country code or special characters."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"email"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"rwauser@dataseers.ai","description":"The user's email address used for account registration."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"password"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"The user's chosen password for account access. This should be a secure, encrypted string."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"confirm_password"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"A confirmation of the user's password to ensure both entries match."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>

      >
        <div>
          
          
          Please enter a valid password.
          
          
        </div><div>
          
        </div>
      </TabItem><TabItem
        label={"407"}
        value={"407"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          Required parameters are missing.
          
          
        </div><div>
          
        </div>
      </TabItem><TabItem
        label={"410"}
        value={"410"}
      >
        <div>
